lines.text:
[ALF is strapped into an electric chair]
I take it this isn't the word association test.
No, no. We're going to conduct a different test.
I'm not sure I like the word 'conduct'.

[after ALF looks at a High Voltage sign]
Oh, pay no attention to that sign, it shouldn't even be there. I'll remove it if it bothers you.
It bothers me.
[Warner gets electrocuted when trying to remove the sign and falls over]

[as Warner begins to sizzle on the floor]
Medic. Medic.
[some time after Dr. Warner was electrocuted]
Hello, Alf, I'm Dr. Newman.
No need to ask who you're replacing.
We're going to try a little game called numeric sequencing.
Does involve electric shock?
Absolutely not.
Forgive me if I'm still paranoid, there's still a silhouette burned into the linoleum.
[the military is playing a video of one of the tests done on ALF]
This one is definitely the Pepsi.
[Mullican and Hill have kidnapped ALF and put him in a mail bag]
Don't look now, the mail's awake.
What's going on? Oh, wait, now I remember, I'm being kidnapped by humans. There's a switch.
Good morning. I'm Dr. Carnage.
Yikes.
Yikes yourself.
Hello, I'm Mockton. I'm going to show you some inkblots.
Does this involve electric shock?
Let's not start that again.
Let's try some word association. I'll say a word and you say whatever pops into your mind.
Food.
I haven't said anything yet.
Nothing interesting, at least.
Sit.
I am sitting.
sit.
Oh, um... food.
Sunrise.
Breakfast.
Square.
Meal.
Left.
Overs.
Should we stop and get you something to eat.
I could use a little snack.
I'm a bit curious about the "Don't ask, don't tell" policy here in the military.
What about it?
Well it assume it's worked to you advantage.

[to the camera]
Stop the tape.
[after watching footage of Alf in a crash test]
That crash test is the perfect example of the cruel and inhumane punishment Alf has been subjected to, Mr. Chairmen.
He had an airbag, it just didn't work.

[Rick is angrily venting his contempt for Dexter Moyers]
Rick, I've never seen you like this.
Nah, I just don't like the guy, is all.
No, I mean from this angle... and I thought I had a lot of nose hair.
